name: OF MICE AND SAND -REVISED-
description: On a desert planet in the farthest reaches of space, mice await your command! Direct their mobile fortress, and seek the legendary city of gold!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Celeron G1620, AMD A4-7300 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Intel HD 3000 or equivalent DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space
